metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to fireplaces and to solid-fuel-burning appliances
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to fireplaces and to solid-fuel-burning appliances

requirements.description: Chimneys serving fireplaces shall conform to Section 9.21
requirements.exact_quote: Chimneys serving fireplaces shall conform to Section 9.21

requirements.description: Masonry fireplaces shall conform to CAN/CSA-A405-M
requirements.exact_quote: Masonry fireplaces shall conform to CAN/CSA-A405-M, "Design and Construction of Masonry Chimneys and Fireplaces"

requirements.description: Minimum depth of masonry firebox
requirements.exact_quote: The firebox of a masonry fireplace shall have a depth of not less than 500 mm

requirements.description: Firebox walls shall be lined with firebrick at least 50 mm thick
requirements.exact_quote: Firebox walls shall be lined with firebrick at least 50 mm thick

requirements.description: Minimum thickness of firebrick lining in firebox
requirements.exact_quote: firebrick at least 50 mm thick

requirements.description: Maximum slope of smoke chamber walls from vertical
requirements.exact_quote: The walls of a smoke chamber shall not slope more than 45 degrees from vertical

requirements.description: Minimum thickness of parging on smoke chamber walls
requirements.exact_quote: Smoke chamber walls shall be parged smooth with a minimum 13 mm thick layer of mortar

requirements.description: Every fireplace shall be equipped with a metal damper located above the throat of the fireplace
requirements.exact_quote: Every fireplace shall be equipped with a metal damper located above the throat of the fireplace

requirements.description: Minimum cross-sectional area of combustion air supply duct
requirements.exact_quote: A duct with a minimum cross-sectional area of 6450 mm2 shall be provided for outdoor combustion air

requirements.description: Combustion air duct shall terminate within the firebox or within 600 mm of the fireplace opening
requirements.exact_quote: Combustion air duct shall terminate within the firebox or within 600 mm of the fireplace opening

requirements.description: Maximum distance from fireplace opening for combustion air termination
requirements.exact_quote: within 600 mm of the fireplace opening

requirements.description: Factory-built fireplaces shall conform to ULC/ORD-C1001
requirements.exact_quote: Factory-built fireplaces shall conform to ULC/ORD-C1001 or CAN/ULC-S610

requirements.description: Factory-built fireplaces shall be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions and listing requirements
requirements.exact_quote: Factory-built fireplaces shall be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions and listing requirements

requirements.description: Minimum hearth extension in front of fireplace opening where opening area is less than 0.5 m2
requirements.exact_quote: The hearth extension shall project not less than 400 mm in front of the fireplace opening where the fireplace opening is less than 0.5 m2

requirements.description: Minimum hearth extension in front of fireplace opening where opening area is 0.5 m2 or more
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 500 mm where the fireplace opening is 0.5 m2 or more

requirements.description: Minimum hearth extension at each side of fireplace opening
requirements.exact_quote: The hearth extension shall project not less than 200 mm at each side of the fireplace opening

requirements.description: Hearths shall be constructed of concrete, stone, brick, tile, or other noncombustible material
requirements.exact_quote: Hearths shall be constructed of concrete, stone, brick, tile, or other noncombustible material

requirements.description: Minimum thickness of hearth material
requirements.exact_quote: The hearth shall be not less than 50 mm thick

requirements.description: Where hearth is supported by combustible materials, a minimum air space of 50 mm shall be provided
requirements.exact_quote: Where a hearth is supported by combustible materials, a minimum air space of 50 mm shall be provided between the hearth and the combustible materials

requirements.description: Minimum air space between hearth and combustible support materials
requirements.exact_quote: a minimum air space of 50 mm

requirements.description: Minimum clearance from back wall of firebox to combustible materials
requirements.exact_quote: The clearance from the back wall of the firebox of a masonry fireplace to combustible materials shall be not less than 50 mm

requirements.description: Minimum clearance from sides of firebox to combustible materials
requirements.exact_quote: The clearance from the sides of the firebox shall be not less than 200 mm

requirements.description: Minimum clearance from top of fireplace opening to combustible mantel shelf projecting more than 38 mm
requirements.exact_quote: Combustible mantel shelves projecting more than 38 mm from the face of the fireplace shall have a clearance of not less than 300 mm from the top of the fireplace opening

requirements.description: Maximum mantel shelf projection without increased clearance above fireplace opening
requirements.exact_quote: Combustible mantel shelves projecting not more than 38 mm from the face of the fireplace may extend to within 150 mm of the top of the fireplace opening

requirements.description: Minimum clearance from top of fireplace opening to combustible mantel shelf projecting 38 mm or less
requirements.exact_quote: may extend to within 150 mm of the top of the fireplace opening

requirements.description: Minimum clearance from fireplace opening to combustible trim or facing within 12 mm of masonry
requirements.exact_quote: Combustible trim or facing located within 12 mm of the masonry fireplace shall have a clearance of not less than 150 mm from the fireplace opening
